title: [SOSP 2019] AutoMine: Harmonizing High-Level Abstraction and High Performance for Graph Mining
description: Compiling subgraph patterns into efficient code for mining them

title: [ICS 2019] Laius: Towards Latency Awareness and Improved Utilization of Spatial Multitasking Accelerators in Datacenters
authors: Wei Zhang, Weihao Cui, Kaihua Fu, Quan Chen, Daniel Mawhirter, Bo Wu, Chao Li, Minyi Guo
description: GPU multitasking using dynamic, latency-aware scheduling

title: [EUROSYS 2019] GRNN: Low-Latency and Scalable RNN Inference on GPUs
authors: Connor Holmes, Daniel Mawhirter, Yuxiong He, Feng Yan, Bo Wu
description: Accelerating RNN inference on GPU using aggressive, flexible register file utilization optimization

title: [CCGrid 2018] ApproxG: Fast Approximate Parallel Graphlet Counting Through Accuracy Control
authors: Daniel Mawhirter, Bo Wu, Dinesh Mehta, Chao Ai
description: Using sampling techniques to accelerate counting of graphlets containing 3 and 4 vertices on a cluster

title: [PACT 2017] Graphie: Large-Scale Asynchronous Graph Traversals on Just a GPU
authors: Wei Han, Daniel Mawhirter, Matthew Buland, Bo Wu
description: Processing graphs larger than GPU memory using efficient sharding and computation-communication overlapping
